analysis.description:
CI10Token.updateBalance (/unique_chucks/42/0xb115a68672286e3b03103aaf352cd0d70ad847dc.sol#186-195) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- startBlocks[tokenOwner] == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xb115a68672286e3b03103aaf352cd0d70ad847dc.sol:
	Contract CI10Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xb115a68672286e3b03103aaf352cd0d70ad847dc.sol#275-276)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/42/0xb115a68672286e3b03103aaf352cd0d70ad847dc.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/42/0xb115a68672286e3b03103aaf352cd0d70ad847dc.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xb115a68672286e3b03103aaf352cd0d70ad847dc.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
